title: "AI is already being melded with robotics – one outcome could be powerful new weapons"
excerpt: "Robot dogs aren’t aiming weapons at opposing forces just yet. But all the elements are there for this scenario to become a reality, if left unchecked. The fast pace of development in both AI and robotics is creating a perfect storm that could lead to powerful new weapons."
